text: Though only arithmetically, R 0 can be calculated by dividing the observed cumulative number of cases by (1 + R 1 + R 2 R 1 +R 3 R 2 R 1 ). Additionally, we incorporated the effectiveness of the interventions implemented during the 2014 outbreak. As Table 1 shows, mosquito control started on 28 August (T 1 ); subsequently, Yoyogi Park was closed on 4 September (T 2 ). We wished to assess the effectiveness of these two interventions separately. We used relative reduction in the reproduction number, Îµ(t), defined as follows:
